channel.title: 编译 on Sakura Notes
channel.description: Recent content in 编译 on Sakura Notes

item.title: 编译
item.description: 编译 编译命令 单文件编译 g++ test.cpp -o test -fsanitize=address cmake和make编译 设置安装目录：设置输出目录（+安装目录） ./configure cmake -S . -B build # 或使用 cd build + cmake ../ cd build make -sj 2 2>&1|grep rror
